attributes.action: Legalise privately owned e scooters, create insurance with Id attached
attributes.additional_details:
This will lower pollution as people will seek greener ways of traveling. 
By having insurance like any other motor vehicle will ensure people will comply with regulations set. And having registration like other motor vehicles. Will make it easier to enforce and ensure people will comply. 
Wearing helmets on roads will ensure the safety of those riding them.
attributes.background: Legalise the use of E Scooters for use in cycle lanes, roads where applicable. Have insurance and a database like that the DVLA. Ensure people wear helmets like those who ride a moped or motorbike on roads.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action: 

"Allow electric e-scooters to be able to ride on pavements and roads" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747006

"Allow personal e-scooters on public roads for holders of a Category A licence" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/735952
